mapper.select: select c.chat_id, c.chat_list_id, c.user_id, c.created_at, c.updated_at, c.content, c.type, u.name, u.profile_image, cl.cr_name, cl.icon_url from chat c left join user u on c.user_id = u.user_id left join chat_list cl on c.chat_list_id = cl.chat_list_id where c.chat_list_id = #{chat_list_id} and c.updated_at between date_add(now(), interval -1 month) AND date_add(now(), interval -0 month) order by updated_at asc;
